appDesc.message: Remembers the duration of visited videos and displays them in a convenient list.

statusLoading.description: Status text when the popup is loading.

statusTabsFound.description: Status text showing how many tabs were found. $1 is a placeholder for the number.

statusNoTabs.description: Status text when no YouTube tabs are open.

statusUpdated.description: Status text after refreshing. $1 is updated count, $2 is total count.
